story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Yo, Galar Champion! We were just talking
about you.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You’re looking stronger than the last time we
battled.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Lemme guess... You’ve been training a lot since
you lost to Red, haven’t you.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You’re just like Red. Especially how you react
to losing.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But we have such different personalities
and styles.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I’m not talking about your appearance or
personality. I mean on a core level.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Winning makes you two happier than anyone,
while losing makes you the most frustrated.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You’re both unbelievably straightforward and
earnest when it comes to Pokémon.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: Leon, you and Red are the same kind of strong.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: So trying to outdo each other isn’t gonna be easy.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
That said, I know you’re not the type to stay down
after losing, right?
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You beat me, after all. So make sure you beat
Red, too!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: I’ll be your training partner, if you need one!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2000_10: Blue has been analyzing Red quite a bit.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I’m sure he’d be an excellent teacher.
Don’t you agree?
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: I bet he will. And a reliable ally!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2300_10:
So...Rose was gonna take me to you so we could
chat, but before he could...
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Charizard was already on it and brought you
to us!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Hahaha! Your partner sure knows how to get
work done!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I suppose it’s Charizard’s job to guide Leon when
he’s lost, hm?
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2800_10:
That’s true. Whenever I lose my way, you’re
always there to guide me.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_2900_10: You helped me out today, too!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Hahaha! That’s Leon and Charizard for ya!
What a sync pair!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3200_10: If I may, I have a proposal.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Would you like a rematch with Red in the
Arceus Cup?
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3400_10:
It’ll be your chance to redeem yourself, and I’m
sure it’ll get everyone’s attention.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Just say the word, and I can make a match
between you and Red happen!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3700_10:
This is a battle I can’t afford to lose, not for the
second time in front of everyone. And there’s no
backing out, either...right?
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_3900_10:
But I think pushing yourself even further would
make you stronger.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4000_10: Hahaha. You sure are crafty, Chairman Rose.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4100_10: You already knew how I’d respond, didn’t you.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4300_10:
I was hoping for a rematch with Red on a
grand stage!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4400_10:
I don’t think we’ll ever reach where we need to
be for an arc suit unless we push ourselves.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Yeah. Lately, I’ve been training to awaken my
arc suit.
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4800_10:
If you reveal it on the day of battle, the crowd
will go wild!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Now that you’ve a goal in mind, time to get a
move on!
story_arceus_02_05000/2401_1001_5000_10: Precisely! I’ll be counting on your expertise, Blue!
